using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading;
using System.IO;
using System.Reflection;
using UnifiedAutomation.UaBase;
using UnifiedAutomation.UaServer;
namespace SUT.LAB1
{
    internal partial class LAB1NodeManager : BaseNodeManager
    {
        

        Tank tank = new Tank();
        Boolean automaticModeWasFillingUp = false;

        #region Constructor
        /// <summary>
        /// Initializes a new instance of the class.
        /// </summary>
        public LAB1NodeManager(ServerManager server) : base(server)
        {
        }
        #endregion

        #region IDisposable
        /// <summary>
        /// An overrideable version of the Dispose.
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="disposing"></param>
        protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)
        {
            if (disposing)
            {
                // TBD
            }
        }
        #endregion

        #region Overridden Methods
        /// <summary>
        /// Called when the node manager is started.
        /// </summary>
        public override void Startup()
        {
            try
            {
                Console.WriteLine("Starting LAB1NodeManager.");

                DefaultNamespaceIndex = AddNamespaceUri("http://yourorganisation.org/OPC_UA/");

                Console.WriteLine("Loading the LAB1 Model.");
                ImportUaNodeset(Assembly.GetEntryAssembly(), "opc_ua.xml");

                VariableNode level = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5005, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Level", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 1, Offset = 1 });

                VariableNode automatic = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5005, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Automatic", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 1, Offset = 2 });

                VariableNode counter = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5005, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Counter", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 1, Offset = 3 });

                VariableNode p1Flow = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5004, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Flow", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 2, Offset = 1 });

                VariableNode p1On = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5004, 2),
                new QualifiedName("On", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 2, Offset = 2 });

                VariableNode p1Off = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5004, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Off", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 2, Offset = 3 });

                VariableNode p1State = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5004, 2),
                new QualifiedName("State", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 2, Offset = 4 });

                VariableNode p2Flow = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5006, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Flow", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 3, Offset = 1 });

                VariableNode p2On = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5006, 2),
                new QualifiedName("On", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 3, Offset = 2 });

                VariableNode p2Off = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5006, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Off", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 3, Offset = 3 });

                VariableNode p2State = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5006, 2),
                new QualifiedName("State", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 3, Offset = 4 });

                VariableNode vFlow = SetVariableConfiguration(
               new NodeId(5007, 2),
               new QualifiedName("Flow", 2),
               NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 4, Offset = 1 });

                VariableNode vClosed = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5007, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Closed", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 4, Offset = 2 });

                VariableNode vOpened = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5007, 2),
                new QualifiedName("Opened", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 4, Offset = 3 });

                VariableNode vState = SetVariableConfiguration(
                new NodeId(5006, 2),
                new QualifiedName("State", 2),
                NodeHandleType.ExternalPolled, new SystemAddress() { Address = 4, Offset = 4 });

                tank.P1.Off.Value = true;
                tank.P1.On.Value = false;
                tank.P1.State.Value = false;
                tank.P1.Flow.Value = false;
                tank.Automatic.Value = false;
                tank.Counter.Value = 0;
                tank.Level.Value = 0;
                tank.P2.Off.Value = true;
                tank.P2.On.Value = false;
                tank.P2.State.Value = false;
                tank.P2.Flow.Value = false;
                tank.Z.Closed.Value = true;
                tank.Z.Flow.Value = false;
                tank.Z.Opened.Value = false;
                tank.Z.State.Value = false;


            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                Console.WriteLine("Failed to start LAB1NodeManager " + e.Message);
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Called when the node manager is stopped.
        /// </summary>
        public override void Shutdown()
        {
            try
            {
                Console.WriteLine("Stopping LAB1NodeManager.");

                // TBD
            }
            catch (Exception e)
            {
                Console.WriteLine("Failed to stop LAB1NodeManager " + e.Message);
            }
        }
        #endregion

        protected override void Read(
           RequestContext context,
           TransactionHandle transaction,
           IList<NodeAttributeOperationHandle> operationHandles,
           IList<ReadValueId> settings)
        {
            for (int ii = 0; ii < operationHandles.Count; ii++)
            {
                DataValue dv = null;

                // the data passed to CreateVariable is returned as the UserData in the handle.
                SystemAddress address = operationHandles[ii].NodeHandle.UserData as SystemAddress;

                if (address != null)
                {
                    // read the data from the underlying system.
                    object value = null;

                    if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6078") value = tank.P1.Off.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6081") value = tank.P1.On.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6084") value = tank.P1.State.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6075") value = tank.P1.Flow.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6068") value = tank.Automatic.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6071") value = tank.Counter.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6073") {

                        if (tank.Automatic.Value)
                        {

                            if (tank.Level.Value <= 1)
                            {

                                if (automaticModeWasFillingUp == false)                             
                                    tank.Counter.Value = tank.Counter.Value + 1;

                                tank.Z.Closed.Value = false;
                                tank.Z.Opened.Value = true;
                                tank.Z.State.Value = true;
                                tank.P1.Off.Value = true;
                                tank.P1.On.Value = false;
                                tank.P1.State.Value = false;
                                tank.P2.Off.Value = true;
                                tank.P2.On.Value = false;
                                tank.P2.State.Value = false;
                                automaticModeWasFillingUp = true;


                            }
                           if (tank.Level.Value >= 20)
                            {
                                tank.Z.Closed.Value = true;
                                tank.Z.Opened.Value = false;
                                tank.Z.State.Value = true;
                                tank.P1.Off.Value = false;
                                tank.P1.On.Value = true;
                                tank.P1.State.Value = true;
                                tank.P2.Off.Value = false;
                                tank.P2.On.Value = true;
                                tank.P2.State.Value = true;

                                automaticModeWasFillingUp = false;
                            }
                        }

                        if (tank.Z.State.Value == true)
                        {
                            if (tank.Level.Value < 32000) tank.Level.Value = tank.Level.Value + 0.2;
                            else if(tank.Level.Value == 32000)
                            {
                                tank.Z.Closed.Value = true;
                                tank.Z.Opened.Value = false;
                                tank.Z.State.Value = true;
                            }

                        }
                        if(tank.P1.State.Value == true)
                        {
                            if (tank.Level.Value > 0) tank.Level.Value = tank.Level.Value - 0.2;
                            else if (tank.Level.Value <= 0)
                            {
                                tank.Level.Value = 0;
                                tank.P1.Off.Value = true;
                                tank.P1.On.Value = false;
                                tank.P1.State.Value = false;
                                tank.P2.Off.Value = true;
                                tank.P2.On.Value = false;
                                tank.P2.State.Value = false;
                            }
                        }
                        if (tank.P2.State.Value == true)
                        {
                            if (tank.Level.Value > 0) tank.Level.Value = tank.Level.Value - 0.2;
                            else if (tank.Level.Value <= 0)
                            {
                                tank.Level.Value = 0;
                                tank.P1.Off.Value = true;
                                tank.P1.On.Value = false;
                                tank.P1.State.Value = false;
                                tank.P2.Off.Value = true;
                                tank.P2.On.Value = false;
                                tank.P2.State.Value = false;
                            }
                        }
                        value = tank.Level.Value;
                    }
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6090") value = tank.P2.Off.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6093") value = tank.P2.On.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6096") value = tank.P2.State.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6087") value = tank.P2.Flow.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6099") value = tank.Z.Closed.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6102") value = tank.Z.Flow.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6105") value = tank.Z.Opened.Value;
                    else if (operationHandles[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6108") value = tank.Z.State.Value;

                    if (value != null)
                    {
                        dv = new DataValue(new Variant(value, null), DateTime.UtcNow);

                        // apply any index range or encoding.
                        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(settings[ii].IndexRange) || !QualifiedName.IsNull(settings[ii].DataEncoding))
                        {
                            dv = ApplyIndexRangeAndEncoding(
                                operationHandles[ii].NodeHandle,
                                dv,
                                settings[ii].IndexRange,
                                settings[ii].DataEncoding);
                        }
                    }
                }

                // set an error if not found.
                if (dv == null)
                {
                    dv = new DataValue(new StatusCode(StatusCodes.BadNodeIdUnknown));
                }

                // return the data to the caller.
                ((ReadCompleteEventHandler)transaction.Callback)(
                    operationHandles[ii],
                    transaction.CallbackData,
                    dv,
                    false);
            }
        }

        protected override void Write(
           RequestContext context,
           TransactionHandle transaction,
           IList<NodeAttributeOperationHandle> operationHandles,
           IList<WriteValue> settings)
        {
            for (int ii = 0; ii < operationHandles.Count; ii++)
            {
                StatusCode error = StatusCodes.Good;

                // the data passed to CreateVariable is returned as the UserData in the handle.
                SystemAddress address = operationHandles[ii].NodeHandle.UserData as SystemAddress;

                if (address != null)
                {
                    if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(settings[ii].IndexRange))
                    {
                        error = StatusCodes.BadIndexRangeInvalid;
                    }
                    //else if (!m_system.Write(address.Address, address.Offset, settings[ii].Value.Value))
                    //{
                    //    error = StatusCodes.BadUserAccessDenied;
                    //}
                    if(settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() ==  "6078")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.P1.On.Value = value;
                        tank.P1.Off.Value = !value;
                        tank.P1.State.Value = value;
                    }
                    else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6081")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.P1.On.Value = !value;
                        tank.P1.Off.Value = value;
                        tank.P1.State.Value = !value;
                    }
                    else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6090")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.P2.On.Value = value;
                        tank.P2.Off.Value = !value;
                        tank.P2.State.Value = value;
                    }
                    else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6093")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.P2.On.Value = !value;
                        tank.P2.Off.Value = value;
                        tank.P2.State.Value = !value;
                    }
                    else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6099")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.Z.Closed.Value = value;
                        tank.Z.Opened.Value = !value;
                        tank.Z.State.Value = !value;
                    }
                    else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6105")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.Z.Closed.Value = !value;
                        tank.Z.Opened.Value = value;
                        tank.Z.State.Value = value;
                    }
                    else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6108")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.P2.On.Value = value;
                        tank.P2.Off.Value = !value;
                        tank.P2.State.Value = value;
                    }
                    else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6068")
                    {
                        Boolean value = false;
                        if (settings[ii].Value.ToString() == "True") value = true;
                        tank.Automatic.Value = value;
                
                    }


                    //STATE 
                    //else if (settings[ii].NodeId.Identifier.ToString() == "6084")
                    //{
                    //    Boolean value = false;
                    //    if (!settings[ii].Value.Equals(true)) value = true;
                    //    tank.P1.On.Value = value;
                    //    tank.P1.Off.Value = !value;
                    //    tank.P1.State.Value = value;
                    //}


                }
                    else
                {
                    error = StatusCodes.BadNodeIdUnknown;
                }

                // return the data to the caller.
                ((WriteCompleteEventHandler)transaction.Callback)(
                    operationHandles[ii],
                    transaction.CallbackData,
                    error,
                    false);
            }
        }

        #region Private Methods
        #endregion

        private class SystemAddress
        {
            public int Address;
            public int Offset;
        }

        #region Private Fields
        #endregion
    }
}
